summary.span: 命名空间包含的接口和结构为单独更新的组件之间的通信提供了基础。

span.span: The namespace contains interfaces and structures that provide the basis for communication between components that are updated independently.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 命名空间定义一组接口和结构，它们可由独立更新的组件（如应用程序和外接程序）用于进行通信。The namespace defines a set of interfaces and structures that can be used by independently updated components, such as an application and an add-in, to communicate. 组件可以使用命名空间中的接口和结构 跨进程或应用程序域边界进行通信，或与同一进程或应用程序域中的其他组件通信。Components can use the interfaces and structures in the namespace to communicate across process or application domain boundaries, or to communicate with other components in the same process or application domain. 命名空间中的接口 也称为 "协定"。The interfaces in the namespace are also called contracts. 所有协定均派生自 接口。All contracts derive from the interface. 为使用 .NET Framework 创建的组件提供的用途类似于 `IUnknown` 接口为使用 COM 创建的组件提供的用途。The purpose that serves for components created using the .NET Framework is similar to the purpose that the `IUnknown` interface serves for components created using COM. 若要确定某个对象是否实现某个特定协定，组件可使用 方法。To determine whether an object implements a particular contract, components use the method. 和 命名空间包含附加了 命名空间的协定。The and namespaces contain additional contracts that supplement the namespace. 命名空间包含组件用来访问类型信息和调用类型成员的协定。The namespace contains contracts that components use to access type information and invoke type members. 命名空间包含定义和对象的集合的协定 。The namespace contains contracts that define collections of and objects.
